name: northware-cockpit
description: Northware App for NCS Internal Organizing
author: NCS Northware (https://github.com/ncs-northware)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONTEND,API -c auto,auto "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:api"

scripts.start:win: cd cockpit-api && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm start
